articles.title: Apple Eyes Fees as It Readies for Europe's Digital Markets Act - PYMNTS.com
articles.description: March looms as a deadline for platforms to be in full compliance with Europe’s Digital Markets Act. Will Big Tech examine new monetization opportunities?
articles.content:
For Apple, the opening of the ecosystem proceeds apace in Europe.
With it, however, comes the potential to realize some additional revenue streams.
And what happens in Europe, with Apple at the epi… [+2895 chars]

articles.title: Space Salad Dilemma: Study Raises Health Concerns for Astronauts - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Research team finds lettuce and other plants are more susceptible to bacterial infections in space than on Earth. Lettuce and other leafy green vegetables are part of a healthy, balanced diet — even for astronauts on a mission. It’s been more than three years…
articles.content: Researchers at the University of Delaware are looking at how plants grown in space are more prone to infections of Salmonella compared to plants not grown in space or grown under gravity simulations.… [+8251 chars]
